description: Treat yourself with this decadent strawberry and almond tart recipe. Golden pastry, almond frangipane and berries make this a great addition to an afternoon tea.
name: Strawberry & Almond Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sheets Woolworths shortcrust pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Grease a 20cm round (3cm deep) fluted tart pan. Line base and side with 1 pastry sheet, trimming excess. Refrigerate for 20 minutes or until chilled.

Prick pastry base with a fork. Line with baking paper and fill with pie weights or uncooked rice. Bake for 15 minutes. Remove weights and paper. Return to oven for 10 minutes or until pastry is light golden. Set aside to cool.
Using an electric mixer, beat butter, sugar and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add flour, almond meal and 1 egg, then stir until combined. Spread almond mixture over pastry case.
Combine strawberries and jam in a medium bowl. Spread strawberry mixture over almond mixture.

Cut remaining pastry sheet into 1cm strips. Arrange pastry strips in a lattice pattern over top of tart. Press edges to seal and trim excess. Beat remaining egg in a small bowl. Brush pastry with beaten egg.
Bake for 35 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Set aside to cool for 10 minutes. Serve tart, warm or at room temperature, with cream.
